application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of sound insulation for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating different types of rooms/uses in adjoining dwellings pursuant to condition 9 of planning permission ref: 233752FUL dated 15/05/2024 for: Conversion of property into three self-contained residential units; single storey rear and side wrap around extension (following demolition of existing side addition); alteration of roof from hip to gable end including raising of roof ridge height; rear roof extension to main roofslope; roof extension to rear outrigger roofslope; installation of two rooflights to front roofslope; associated internal and external alterations; and provision of cycle parking and refuse storage
